body.p: The Board considered but rejected a suggestion that an entity should be permitted to apply the risk mitigation option when it uses non-derivative financial instruments measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. The Board observed that in most circumstances the risk mitigation option would not resolve perceived mismatches between amounts recognised in profit or loss relating to:

li.p: insurance contracts with direct participation features using the other comprehensive income option in IFRS 17; and
assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income.
